3rd Party Synd. Remarks: David Gunderman - 510-205-4369 - The best of Bay Area living in the heart of Rockridge where this 5BR/3.5BA 1910 Craftsman offers modern upgrades, an ideal layout, custom finishes, and a 2-story cottage ADU. From its welcoming sitting porch and clinker brickwork, the 2646 SqFt home opens to a foyer with stained glass and built-in storage. Glass French doors lead into the living room with picture and casement windows and a period brick fireplace. Coffered ceilings, crown molding, and intricate inlaid wood floors continue to a bright dining room. The sunny, renovated kitchen bridges the formal rooms to the convenient family room with custom built-ins, powder room, and office area. Up the gracious staircase, find 4 bedrooms with ample closets, laundry, and 2 full baths, including the primary’s ensuite split bathroom with jet tub and custom closet systems. Enjoy indoor/outdoor living from the kitchen onto a spacious deck and backyard with mature landscaping and level turf. The ultra-charming ADU with full bath could be a rental, office, or guesthouse. A basement with storage and a long tandem driveway complete the property.  Upgrades include: modern foundation (2019), newer backyard drainage system, & sewer lateral compliant. Shopping, great dining, and BART are blocks away on College Ave., with top-rated schools.
Confidential Remarks: **OFFERS 7/25 NOON PLEASE** Bed/Bath/Square Footage does not match public records - buyer to verify* The taking of images of this property is limited to those persons preparing Appraisal or Inspection reports.  Matterport and website: 5581Lawton.com
Directions to Property: College Ave or Broadway to Lawton

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Benjamin Kahn - Agt: 510-260-7141 - Luxurious renovation in a prime Rockridge location! With help from the esteemed Jarvis Architects, the long-time owner thoughtfully brought this classic Craftsman into the modern age while preserving its architectural allure. The brilliant open-concept design provides front to back-of-house sight lines from the kitchen through dining to living room, complete with high-end fixtures. The fabulous kitchen/family room features 2 sinks & Thermador appliances including a 48-inch Professional Series range with double ovens. 2 sets of French doors open to a tiled terrace with infrared outdoor heaters. 3++ stylish bedrooms & 2 remodeled bathrooms include the primary retreat with Restoration Hardware fixtures & a luxurious walk-in closet. The primary bathroom showcases an oversized shower with dual rain shower heads, Statuario marble tile & 2 separate vanities. The retreat with fireplace features 2 more sets of French doors out to a covered patio & sunny lawn. The serene upstairs office could serve multiple purposes. Located on a tree-lined street with sidewalks & friendly neighbors, convenience is everywhere. Mosey on down to College Ave with Wood Tavern, Market Hall, BART & everything else. Or head over to Lake Temescal Regional Recreation Area, Chabot tennis or the nearby school. :)
Confidential Remarks: Offers as written. For showings, text Judy 510-612-0204 & just go. On front door, use top lock only. Camera on front porch. Pre-escrow w/ Old Republic. Sq ft not verified or guaranteed :)

Remarks: Megan Micco - 510-708-9952 - This renovated luxury property combines historic craftsman style, modern infrastructure, and a great location that will serve any aspiring homeowner for years to come. The house features refinished hardwood floors, expansive rooms, beautiful built-in cabinets, and an ideal circular layout. The fully remodeled kitchen offers modern amenities including a Blue Star Range, Bosch dishwasher, and a large wine refrigerator.The primary suite has been transformed into a personal sanctuary with a new ensuite bathroom including a large soaking tub, heated toilet seat, and twin sinks with brass fixtures. The entire home has been updated with modern electrical wiring and an upgraded 200 amp electrical panel for improved safety and efficiency. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Rare 1925 Mediterranean Split-Level nestled on a coveted Rockridge Street just steps from Temescal and College Avenue shopping and dining districts, including the new Whole Foods. 5230 Miles greets visitors with a bright formal living room with fireplace, a formal dining room with built-ins, an eat-in kitchen with breakfast room and pantry, all on the home's main level. Up a short half-flight of stairs are two ample bedrooms, both with good light and closet space, a full bath with shower over tub AND a light-filled bonus room with big windows that could be the perfect home office, nursery or guest room. Warm wood floors and lots of period detail and general vintage charm run through-out. A large basement with laundry and lots of room for hobbies and storage, a separate one car garage, and a 3,800 Sq Ft lot with landscaped front and rear yards, complete this attractive offering. Wonderful central location with excellent proximity to local markets, restaurants, shops, cafes, libraries, schools, parks, freeways, BART, public transit and much more!
Confidential Remarks: Broker's note: This is an as-is Trust sale. Seller reserves the right to accept or reject any & all offers. Buyers should verify all Sq Ft, lot line boundaries, disclosures, and permit history/bed and bath count themselves. Buyers should not rely on any 3rd party reports provided by the seller and obtain all rpts and conduct all investigations they deem necessary.

Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Rockridge, this 3+BR/2+BA  property boasts an open floor plan with a large window that brings an abundance of natural light. As you enter this elegant craftsman, you are greeted with gleaming hardwood floors, a woodburning fireplace, and a large window that floods the space with natural light. The open floor plan is designed for a seamless flow from room to room, and the dining room is generously sized and provides easy access to the kitchen. The sliding doors from the kitchen lead out to a level and fenced-in backyard deck, making it a perfect space for outdoor entertaining and kids playing. On the main floor, there are two bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a laundry area. Second level has a very sunny bedroom,  a bonus room that can be used as a flex space and a Bathroom.This property is just blocks away from the famous Market Hall European-style marketplace and College Avenue amenities, providing easy access to shopping, dining, and entertainment. Outdoor enthusiasts will appreciate the proximity to Lake Temescal, Frog Park, and the Sunday farmer's market. In addition, the property is located in an excellent school district and within walking distance of top-notch private schools.

Remarks: Karen Nelsen - Cell: 510-912-8681 - Come explore this hidden treasure just blocks from Piedmont Ave. Fully fenced private gardens are a delight - a sunny deck off the eat-in kitchen & shady patios by the studio; a separate world from the busy street beyond the front fence. Tankless hot water and a Tesla 2 charger add energy efficiency. Upstairs, the primary suite awaits. Lofted, skylit natural wood ceilings combine stunningly with a newly refinished wood floor in its central room, with a high-ceilinged bedroom w/ double closets on one side and a spacious tiled bathroom on the other. Louvered doors enclose a closet set up for a full-sized washer & dryer.From the deck, a brick path leads down to a room for art or projects. Beyond, wide glass doors of the studio open to a grand space with half-bath and a 10ft ceiling w/ solar panels above. Easy to shops, highly-rated restaurants on Piedmont Ave, Grand Lake & College Ave/Rockridge BART. Walk Score 94.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: David Valdez - 510-593-6100 - Exceptional 3BD/2.5BA home in the heart of Rockridge! Originally built in 2009, this gorgeous home offers a fab layout, outstanding indoor-outdoor flow, tall ceilings, and tasteful finishes throughout. The chef's kitchen features a 36 gas range, built-in Thermador fridge, many thoughtful custom features to enhance the cooking experience – and a dreamy breakfast nook surrounded by windows. The 1-level layout offers 2+ bedrooms (the rear bedroom is an enlarged primary en-suite), 2 full bathrooms, a formal living room with gas fireplace, a formal dining room with built-in cabinetry, an enlarged kitchen/sunroom combo, and laundry conveniently located in the hallway. This is an incredibly comfortable home for all ages (side gate access offers easy entry to the rear of home). The architectural-grade kitchen features custom cherry cabinetry, velvety honed granite countertops, vaulted ceiling, luxury appliance suite, an office nook, and a magical bonus garden room with pocket doors (the sellers used as a guest room) with views of the delightful garden. The expansive primary bedroom suite also features garden views, a home office space, and direct access to the hot tub. The full basement has ample storage, a workshop area, bathroom & utility sink; the 1-car garage has 240v EV charger outlet. The roof is less than 1-year old with owned Solar! Located on a peaceful block with a 94 Walkscore® to Rockridge destinations, a rare Rockridge gem!
Sale COOP: LA & BA same company different office

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: After 45 years with one owner, this Classic Rockridge craftsman is ready to embark on its next journey. With 2 bedrooms plus an additional office, this home graciously accommodates all your needs. The spacious living room adorned with craftsman details and the inviting dining room set the stage for delightful gatherings with friends and family. Meanwhile, the separate office space provides the perfect escape when it's time to detach from work. When it's time to unwind, retreat to the two generously sized, sunlit bedrooms. The expansive yard, adorned with a freshly laid lawn and a spacious patio, beckons for outdoor gatherings or simply enjoying quality time with your furry companion. And below it all, a basement, offering convenient access for home maintenance and the potential for a workshop or extra storage. Throughout the home, air conditioning keeps you comfortable year-round. Recent updates breathe new life into this charming abode, including the refinished Douglas Fir floors, fresh flooring in the kitchen and bath, kitchen quartz countertops, a new sink and stove, as well as an updated bathroom vanity and toilet.
Confidential Remarks: Shown by appointment. Please contact Eve Levine for showing. 347.526.1383 or Matt Gomez 412.216.1268. Contact both via group text for fastest response. Offer date to be 10/17 at noon.Please note that buyers are advised to conduct their own investigations. Vanguard has not verified the foregoing information. Disclosures: https://app.disclosures.io/link/5328-James-Avenue-eyp5t2nt

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Joshua M Dickinson - Agt: 510-323-3669 - Welcome home to this 4BR/2BA quintessential brown shingle Craftsman home in the heart of Rockridge! Historic details await: spacious front porch, tapered Craftsman columns and geometric vertical window grilles. Entry & formal living room offer built-in bench seating, central fireplace and amazing natural light. Through the pocket-doors into the dining room, striking elements include built-ins with stained glass, wainscoting and exposed-beam ceiling. Architect-designed chef’s kitchen is fabulous & functional with farmhouse sink, stone counters, stainless-steel appliances, island with bar-top seating and copious counter space. The standard for California indoor/outdoor flow is set with access to the backyard through the kitchen or adjacent family room. Additional main floor amenities include laundry & homework nook, primary bedroom with adjoining bath and study/home office accessed from the foyer. Open staircase up to second level reveals three bedrooms and large hall bath with custom tile & walk-in shower. Peaceful backyard has multiple vignettes: wrap-around deck, meandering pathway through lush vegetation and detached artist's studio/workshop. Proximity to Rockridge BART, Market Hall & numerous shops/restaurants; Elmwood, Piedmont Ave, Temescal, UC Berkeley, freeways & hiking
Confidential Remarks: Room count differs from public record, buyers to verify.
Directions to Property: College Ave or Claremont Ave to Forest

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Karen Manuel - 510-332-6507 - This delightful 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom bungalow, nestled in the heart of the Piedmont Ave neighborhood, offers 1,148 square feet of comfortable living space. Step inside and be greeted by beautiful hardwood flooring, newly updated kitchen, and a brand new central heat pump offering year-round comfort. The living room flows out to a rooftop deck, the perfect spot for morning coffee. The primary bedroom suite opens to the spacious backyard with expansive deck and garden shed. The garden's been lovingly landscaped by the owner. Environmentally conscious features include solar panels and on-demand water heater. Location is key and this property delivers. With a Walker's Paradise Walk Score of 97, daily errands and leisurely strolls are a breeze. Leave your car behind and explore the vibrant streets on foot. Shop at the new Whole Foods, take a stroll through beautiful Mountain View Cemetery, enjoy the many delicious eateries, or catch a movie at the nearby theater. Sewer & Sidewalk compliant.
Confidential Remarks: 2-4pm, Sewer & Sidewalk Compliant. Solar lease. Square footage taken from public record and not verified by Listing Agents or Broker - Buyer to Verify. OFFERS if any due Wednesday 10/18 @ noon. Please submit through Disclosures IO.
